about_the_game:
Hellfrost: The Ice Fiend & Other Tales


Money, Murder & Mayhem!

The Ice Fiend & Other Tales is a set of four fantastic Hellfrost mini-adventures for seasoned characters.

In The Ice Fiend our heroes are asked to hunt a savage wolf that is terrorising a local farmer’s sheep stock. Or that is what they think! What the end up hunting is a far greater horror and leads them into great peril.

If your heroes want to see battle then A Brief Encounter is for them! Hired as mercenaries, our heroes are ordered to rid the land of some persistent orc raiders.

When you are hired to escort some livestock to the local overlord for tribute it seems like an easy way to earn some money. However this is quickly forgotten as at every step along the way the heroes are attacked by a variety of opponents - in Taxation Troubles.

The Haunted Woods harbour trouble for our heroes. After pitching camp near a dark mysterious forest everything seems peaceful until one of the characters spy a strang pale white light approaching their camp. It is a Fey Knight who commands the characters to track and kill a strange creature which is causing much concern to the local inhabitants.

Within this product you will find:

  • 55 Story entries that describe the action
  • 8 NPCs and Monsters to challenge players

Fantasy Grounds Conversion: Kevin Doswell

Released on May 10, 2018. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.3.5 and higher.

Requirements: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and a one time purchase of the Savage Worlds ruleset.
